ICausticFactory

Defines the main factory for creating Caustic objects

Functions
CreateRenderer
virtual void CreateRenderer(
HWND hwnd,
IRenderer **ppRenderer
) = 0

Creates our basic renderer object to be used by the client

Parameters
hwnd
HWND

HWND to attach D3D renderer to

ppRenderer
IRenderer**

Returns the created renderer

CreateRenderer creates the renderer object that the client will use to talk to the renderer. This object runs on the clients thread and acts only as a proxy for marshalling commands+data over to the renderer thread.

CreateRendererMarshaller
virtual void CreateRendererMarshaller(
IRendererMarshaller **ppMarshaller
) = 0

Creates the marshalled version of the renderer. This renderer marshals all calls over to the render thread (i.e. can be called on any thread)

Parameters
ppMarshaller
IRendererMarshaller**

Returns the created marshalled renderer

CreateRenderable
virtual void CreateRenderable(
ID3D11Buffer *pVB,
uint32 numVertices,
ID3D11Buffer *pIB,
uint32 numIndices,
IRenderMaterial *pFrontMaterial,
IRenderMaterial *pBackMaterial,
DirectX::XMMATRIX &mat,
IRenderable **ppRenderable
) = 0

Creates a renderable object. A Renderable is a mesh+material+shader.

Parameters
pVB
ID3D11Buffer*

vertex buffer

numVertices
uint32

number of vertices in vertex buffer

pIB
ID3D11Buffer*

index buffer

numIndices
uint32

number of indices in index buffer

pFrontMaterial
IRenderMaterial*

Material to apply to front polygons

pBackMaterial
IRenderMaterial*

Material to apply to back polygons

mat
DirectX::XMMATRIX&

matrix to apply to mesh

ppRenderable
IRenderable**

Returns the created Renderable object

CreateCamera
virtual void CreateCamera(
bool leftHanded,
ICamera **ppCamera
) = 0

Creates a new camera object. This camera can then be passed to IRenderer to be used for rendering.

Parameters
leftHanded
bool

Defines whether we have a left or right handed coordinate system

ppCamera
ICamera**

Returns the newly created camera object

) = 0

Converts an IMesh into a renderable form

Parameters

IGraphics*

ISubMesh*

int

indexVersion
int

ID3D11Buffer**
